body:
on the front page, every single category tag is active by default EXCEPT for the political ones. as of now there is no reason why this would need to be. 

if you don't believe me, the source code reaffirms this; https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/blob/698c5683cf4c747cb5bd4968943f41d670050981/ruqqus/classes/boards.py#L606
body_html:

title: What is going on here?

body: Good catch! Apparently there is a user-configurable option to flip them back on
body_html: Good catch! Apparently there is a user-configurable option to flip them back on

body:
[kek says they'll change it](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/5z28/why-was-it-decided-with-the/kpnb?context=3). He says it might've been unintentional, but there's no way that was unintentional lol.

Edit: I thought he said "tomorrow", but it seems like he actually did not.
